issues_found: simctl io screenshot does NOT trigger UIApplication.userDidTakeScreenshotNotification
This is a simulator limitation - simctl bypasses the iOS screenshot mechanism
The detection code is correctly implemented in SharedDataManager.swift:162-219
Darwin notification posting is correctly implemented at line 233-241
App Groups container is accessible and properly configured
Screenshot detection is enabled in preferences: true
testing_recommendations: Use Cmd+S in Simulator UI (opens Simulator.app screenshot tool)
Test on a physical iOS device where screenshot gestures work properly
Monitor logs with: xcrun simctl spawn <udid> log stream --predicate 'subsystem == "com.vibe8.app"'
overall_status: ⚠️ CANNOT TEST - simctl limitation, but code is CORRECT
